verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Sing a song of celebration, lift up a shout of praise,
For the bridegroom will come, the glorious one,
And oh, we will look on His face.
We'll go to a much better placce.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Dance with all your might, lift up your hands
And clap for joy, the time's drawing near,
When He will appear, and oh, we will stand by His side
A strong, pure, spotless bride.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Oh, we will dance on the streets that are golden,
The glorious bride and the great son of man.
From ev'ry tongue and tribe and nation will join
In the song of the Lamb.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Sing aloud for the time of rejoicing is near.
(ladies repeat)
The risen King, our groom, is soon to appear.
(ladies repeat)
The wedding feast to come is now near at hand.
(ladies repeat)
Lift up your voice, proclaim the coming Lamb.
(ladies repeat)
